<div dir="ltr">Hi Everyone,<div><br></div><div>Here are the songs for tonight.</div><div><br></div><div>Thanks!</div><div>~Jon</div><div><br></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-83e2a9d0-4754-5fba-6a3d-69762eb1eeee"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:18.6667px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Wednesday, August 19th 2015</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Before Service:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent"> H343 - “Let us Break Bread Together”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Opening Hymn (Suggestion):</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:400;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H172 - “A Mighty Fortress is our God”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">After Text:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H235; v. 3 - “Just as I am”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Communion Hymn:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H11 - “Got, the All-powerful”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">After Service:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:700;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:400;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H27; v. 3 - “We Gather Together”</span></p></li></ul></span></div></div>
<div dir="ltr">Hi Victor,<div><br></div><div>We are in the process of getting a TV for  the White Plains Congregation. Pr. Slade mentioned that you handled the technical side of a similar project for your congregation. He mentioned that you used a USB stick to get the presentation to the TV. I&#39;ve researched it a little, and I have a question for you:</div><div><br></div><div>From what I can tell, you have to convert the PowerPoint to a movie file, and then run the movie file off the USB. Does that effectively mean that you can post one slide for the whole service? I just want to make sure we&#39;re not missing anything. Frankly having the text word and songs posted would be useful, but if it is possible, I&#39;d like to be able to have several slides displayed. Alternatively, are you able to create a movie file per slide, and then just view the next movie when it comes time to switch?</div><div><br></div><div>I&#39;d appreciate any insight you have.</div><div><br></div><div>Thanks!</div><div>~Jon</div></div><div dir="ltr">Hi Everyone,<div><br></div><div>Here are the songs for tonight&#39;s Word Service.</div><div><br></div><div>Thanks!</div><div>~Jon</div><div><br></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-1ec4e412-db9d-5684-9043-8352e500eccf"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:18.6667px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Wednesday, July 29th 2015</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Before Service:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent"> H5 - “Be Still, for the Presence of the Lord”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Opening Hymn (Suggestion):</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H238 - “Dear Lord, I give Completely”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">After Text:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H130; v. 4 - v. 1,3 - “The Father’s House is our Delight”</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H461; <tbody><tr>
<td width="600" align="left" valign="top">

<div>

<p style="font-size:15px;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;color:#333333;line-height:22px">Prime members can now ask Echo to play hundreds of ad-free, personalized streaming music stations. Like, dislike, or skip as many songs as you wish while you discover songs from the Prime Music catalog. With Prime Stations, the more you listen and rate songs, the more personalized each station becomes.</p> 

<p style="font-size:15px;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;color:#333333;line-height:22px">Get started today with the following requests:
</p><ul style="font-size:15px;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;color:#333333;line-height:22px"> 
<li>Play a <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=XOSAEAFH37GD0GZVUDVROZGYXEEA&amp;T=C&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fb%2F%3Fnode%3D2085987011%26ref_%3Dpe_81240_138474960" target="_blank">Prime Station</a> by saying "Alexa, play the Bruno Mars Prime Station."</li> 

<li>Control playback with "Alexa, next", "Alexa, pause/resume", or "Alexa, go back."</li>

<li>Learn about what's playing by asking "Alexa, what song is this?"</li>

<li>Personalize your stations by saying "Alexa, thumbs up/thumbs down."</li>
</ul> <p></p>
<p style="font-size:15px;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;color:#333333;line-height:22px">Also, because so many of you were interested in IFTTT, we'd like to share some great recipes Echo customers created which can <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=QVRFYQDAGHZ6KBZOFQWOUFQZOF0A&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fifttt.com%2Frecipes%2F286407-alexa-change-temperature" target="_blank">control a Nest thermostat</a>, <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=CDMXEVLESCDA3AXM3G5IFIHVAUGA&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fifttt.com%2Frecipes%2F276623-when-i-add-something-to-my-amazon-echo-shopping-list-add-it-to-my-ios-reminders-as-well" target="_blank">add Shopping List items to an iOS Reminders list</a>, or even have Echo <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=8KV9VPHKQAZW1TLB5A0UGOE96SEA&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fifttt.com%2Frecipes%2F270309-send-someone-a-short-email-via-voice-through-echo-to-do-hack" target="_blank">send an e-mail</a>. Since last Friday, Echo customers have created 10,000 recipes and shared over 100. If you haven't used IFTTT yet, sign up <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=RNPPBZLPZ725HFOL6KUCMKIXIGKA&amp;T=C&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ifttt.com%2F" target="_blank">here</a>, activate the <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=QGM8NFQVQKURKERRZKSFMI7IZWKA&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fifttt.com%2Famazon_alexa" target="_blank">Amazon Alexa channel</a>, and try any of the <a href="https://www.amazon.com/gp/r.html?R=35WBSR808KI5N&amp;C=1I8WJAIRBYXYN&amp;H=QGM8NFQVQKURKERRZKSFMI7IZWKA&amp;T=C&amp;U=https%3A%2F%2Fifttt.com%2Famazon_alexa" target="_blank">shared recipes</a>. Thanks to everyone who has created and shared their recipes!</p>
<p style="font-size:15px;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;color:#333333;line-height:22px">As always, the Amazon Echo team looks forward to your feedback via the Amazon Echo App and on social media (#AmazonEcho). </p>

</div>

I meet the right people at the right time, get to the right place at the right time and do the right thing at the right time. I am bold to declare what I want and confidently reject what I dislike. My path is laced with grace as I move from glory to glory. I always have an unhindered access to whatever I need - resources, materials, information - everything...in my God&#39;s name&quot;  <br> ~ Oluwaseun Oguntuga, Lagos, Nigeria<br><br>HOPE:  The confident expectation of good things from God.<br><br>&#39;For I know the plans I have for you,&#39; says the Lord.  &#39;They are plans for good and not for disaster, to give you a future and a hope.  In those days when you pray, I will listen.  If you look for me wholeheartedly, you will find me.&#39;<br> ~ Jeremiah 29:11-13 – New Living Translation<br><br><br><br><br></div>

</div><div dir="ltr">Hi Everyone,<div><br></div><div>Here are the songs for tonight&#39;s service. Sorry they are so late.</div><div><br></div><div>Thanks!</div><div>~Jon</div><div><br></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-d664e20a-e2f9-ebd0-fdc6-221ac108fdf9"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:19px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Wednesday, April 22nd 2015</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Opening Hymn (Suggestion):</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H241 - “God, All-pow’rful, Help the Humble”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">After Text:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H421; v. 2 - “Safe in the Arms of Jesus”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">During Service:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H83; v. 2 - “Come, for the Feast is Spread”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Communion Hymn:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H360 - “What Joy ‘tis Redeemed to Be”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">After Service:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H481; Not sure about everyone else, but you're right -- it could have been confirmations.&nbsp;<br></div><br><div class="gmail_quote">On Mon, Apr 20, 2015 at 5:41 PM Barb Schenk &lt;barbara.ann.schenk@gmail.com&gt; wrote:<br><blockquote class="gmail_quote" style="margin:0 0 0 .8ex;border-left:1px #ccc solid;padding-left:1ex;"><p>thanks, jon!  wonder where everyone was?  may be there were other confirmations happening.  </p>

</blockquote></div><br><br clear="all"><br></div><div class="gmail_extra">-- <br><div>&quot;My steps are ordered in my God&#39;s name. I move by divine programming. I meet the right people at the right time, get to the right place at the right time and do the right thing at the right time. I am bold to declare what I want and confidently reject what I dislike. My path is laced with grace as I move from glory to glory. I always have an unhindered access to whatever I need - resources, materials, information - everything...in my God&#39;s name&quot;  <br> ~ Oluwaseun Oguntuga, Lagos, Nigeria<br><br>HOPE:  The confident expectation of good things from God.<br><br>&#39;For I know the plans I have for you,&#39; says the Lord.  &#39;They are plans for good and not for disaster, to give you a future and a hope.  In those days when you pray, I will listen.  If you look for me wholeheartedly, you will find me.&#39;<br> ~ Jeremiah 29:11-13 – New Living Translation<br><br><br><br><br></div>
</div></blockquote></div></blockquote></div></div></div>

“Rejoice, the Lord is King”</span></p></li><li style="color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:Arial;font-size:16px;font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;list-style-type:disc;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="line-height:1.38;font-weight:normal;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H247 &nbsp;- “Just as God Leads Me”</span></p></li><li style="color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:Arial;font-size:16px;font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;list-style-type:disc;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H174 - “Be Still, My Soul”</span></p></li><li style="color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:Arial;font-size:16px;vertical-align:baseline;list-style-type:disc;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap">203 - "Jesus My Savior"</span></p></li><li style="color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:Arial;font-size:16px;font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;list-style-type:disc;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H318 - “I Hear Thy Welcome Voice”</span></p></li></ul></span></div></div>
</blockquote></div><br><br clear="all"><br></div><div class="gmail_extra">-- <br><div>"My steps are ordered in my God's name. I move by divine programming. I meet the right people at the right time, get to the right place at the right time and do the right thing at the right time. I am bold to declare what I want and confidently reject what I dislike. My path is laced with grace as I move from glory to glory. I always have an unhindered access to whatever I need - resources, materials, information - everything...in my God's name"&nbsp; <br>&nbsp;~ Oluwaseun Oguntuga, Lagos, Nigeria<br><br>HOPE:&nbsp; The confident expectation of good things from God.<br><br>'For I know the plans I have for you,' says the Lord.&nbsp; 'They are plans for good and not for disaster, to give you a future and a hope.&nbsp; In those days when you pray, I will listen.&nbsp; If you look for me wholeheartedly, you will find me.'<br>&nbsp;~ Jeremiah 29:11-13 – New Living Translation<br><br><br><br><br></div>
</div></blockquote></div></blockquote></div></div></div><p dir="ltr">Sure. By the way, I'm our for Memorial Day. Beyond that, I'm available.</p>
<p dir="ltr">Thanks!<br>
~Jon</p>

“Rejoice, the Lord is King”</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Choir Practice </span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">[Will use for Service if Good]</span><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H312 - “Come Thou Fount of Every Blessing”</span></p></li><li style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.38;background-color:transparent">H517 - “Rejoice, the Lord is King”</span></p></li><li style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;white-space:pre-wrap;line-height:1.38;background-color:transparent">H247  - “Just as God Leads Me”</span></p></li><li style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H174 - “Be Still, My Soul”</span></p></li><li style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap">203 - &quot;Jesus My Savior&quot;</span></p></li><li style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-weight:normal;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">H318 - “I Hear Thy Welcome Voice”</span></p></li></ul></span></div></div>
</div></blockquote></div></blockquote></div><div dir="ltr">Hi Everyone,<div><br></div><div>Here are the songs for tomorrow. See you at 9:30 AM for practice!</div><div><br></div><div>Thanks!</div><div>~Jon</div><div><br></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-175ef7f8-ceef-909e-54a5-825b8efc6348"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:19px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Sunday, April 19th 2015</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:bold;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">Before Service:</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:16px;font-family:Arial;color:rgb(0,0,0);vertical-align:baseline;background-color:transparent"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt"><span style="vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre-wrap;background-color:transparent">203; v. 1,2 -
